name: Bilateral Trigeminal-Tentorial Dural Arteriovenous Fistula
chief_complaint: I have unbearable facial pain and hear a constant whooshing sound in my ears
prognosis: Guarded - high recurrence rate without complete occlusion, potential for catastrophic hemorrhage if untreated
description: An extremely rare neurovascular condition where abnormal connections form between meningeal arteries and the tentorial venous plexus, with simultaneous involvement of trigeminal nerve feeding vessels. The dual drainage pathways create complex hemodynamic stresses on the cavernous sinus and petrosal venous systems.
